data.name: Skitt
data.detailed_description:
The story of the leader of a shelter who will have to make difficult decisions to protect his people from a parasite that turns humans into monsters.

The enemy can take various forms

The parasite can transform into all kinds of aberrations in order to survive. Eliminating such an enemy will not be an easy thing...

Choose the character that fits the situation

There are four different classes: Damage, Agile, Heavy, and Healer. Each class has two characters with abilities and weapons that make them unique. Choose the class and character depending on the situation.

Use the advantage that suits your way of playing

After choosing the character you can choose an advantage that can change from their weapons to their abilities and thus, adapt to your style of play.

Upgrade your base to unlock new game mechanics

You can upgrade three areas of your shelter: social, training and research areas. By improving them you get improvements in the gameplay such as advantages or objects that you can use in missions such as a Molotov cocktail or a bait to distract the enemies.

Make decisions that affect the game systems

In history there will be critical moments in which you will have to make decisions that affect the game systems in a negative or positive way. These decisions stack so the effects will be greater the more you progress in the story.

data.short_description: Skitt is a first person hero shooter. Choose your character, upgrade your shelter and protect it from a devastating parasite.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.4 Ghz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 1030
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 11 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.4 Ghz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 1050 ti
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 11 GB available space

content_descriptors.notes: Use of weapons and violence. Murder scenes.
